data.name: LiMiT's Escape Room Games 2
data.detailed_description:
Work In Progress: All content (incl. store content (ike logos and screenshots), puzzles and complete areas/maps) can still change a lot or even be removed until the release.

In the next chapter of the Escape Room bundle you can expect 4 levels with a lot to discover and solve. The 4 levels differ in difficulty:

  • Lake (Difficulty: Easy)
  • Mineshaft (Difficulty: Medium)
  • Cabin (Difficulty: Medium)
  • Warehouse (Difficulty: Hard)

Start on a lobby map where you can meet up with your friends. Here you can choose a character, make settings, spend the time with puzzles you've already unlocked in the Escape Rooms, and play a challenge or two with or against your friends.
Then, when you're all ready, start a level and the fun begins.

  • Move around in the 3D first person perspective (this time also with jumping :D)
  • Lobby map with arcade levels of unlocked puzzles
  • Play with up to 8 players (2-4 recommended)
  • Tricky puzzles
  • 4 levels with different difficulty
  • Hint system
  • Color blind mode - choose your own colors

For questions, feedback or support requests join my Discord or write in the discussion section.

data.short_description: The next chapter of the Escape Room bundle with better controls and jumping! ;) This time you can expect (alone or with friends) 4 levels, which differ in difficulty. The rooms are designed for a gameplay of 1-1.5 hours each. Can you beat this time again?
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4000 series or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
